content.raw: The align tool doesn't get activated if you multi-select from the palette. I have a possible fix here f99b42e

pullrequest.title: Add model editor selection events and delete menu option

content.raw: +1. This happened to me when I clicked on a link and then multi-selected by clicking on the name in the palette, but if I only click on links or only click on names, the Align tool works. Louise's fix looks good
content.html: +1. This happened to me when I clicked on a link and then multi-selected by clicking on the name in the palette, but if I only click on links or only click on names, the Align tool works. Louise's fix looks good

content.html:
As an alternative you can replace the whole if block with:

this->SetSelected(vis, it == this->selectedJoints.end());

or

auto found = std::find(this->selectedJoints.begin(), this->selectedJoints.end(), vis) != this->selectedJoints.end();
this->SetSelected(vis, !found);

An alternative for:

for (auto &item : this->selected)
